title: SINGER Primax S43-SLE43U5000GOTV 43 Inch 4K Android Google TV
cat_seo_title: SINGER TV Price in Bangladesh 2024 | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy SINGER TV at the best price in Bangladesh. Find the latest SINGER Television at lowest price in Star Tech Shop. Order online & get delivery in BD.
full_description:
SINGER Primax S43-SLE43U5000GOTV 43 Inch 4K Android Google TV

The SINGER Primax S43-SLE43U5000GOTV is an advanced 43-inch 4K Android Google TV that offers a visually spectacular and immersive entertainment experience. This television's sleek and frameless design not only enhances your watching enjoyment but also matches your living environment with its modern aesthetics. The SINGER Primax S43-SLE43U5000GOTV boasts a crystal-clear 4K resolution of 3840 x 2160 pixels, ensuring that every detail on the screen is rendered with remarkable clarity. This Singer television features a generous 108 cm (43-inch) display, making it suitable for a wide range of room sizes and viewing distances. The TV supports DOLBY Vision and Atmos technologies, delivering a visual and auditory experience that is second to none. DOLBY Vision enhances the color, contrast, and brightness of the picture, while Atmos provides immersive, three-dimensional sound. Equipped with MEMC (Motion Estimation Motion Compensation) technology, this TV reduces motion blur and ensures smooth, lifelike motion in fast-paced scenes, whether you're watching sports or action-packed movies. The Singer TV is powered by a high-performance QC CPU and features 2GB of RAM and 16GB of internal storage (ROM). This robust hardware configuration ensures seamless multitasking and ample space for your favorite apps and content. The SINGER Primax S43-SLE43U5000GOTV incorporates Dolby audio sound with dual 10W speakers. This setup delivers clear, powerful audio that enhances your overall viewing experience, allowing you to hear every detail, from whispers to explosions, with precision. The SINGER Primax S43-SLE43U5000GOTV is a top-tier pick whether you're a movie buff, a gamer, or simply seeking for a TV with great picture and sound quality for your everyday entertainment requirements. It puts the world of 4K video and Android apps at your fingertips, all while effortlessly connecting with your smart home environment, thanks to its frameless design, innovative technologies, and amazing technology. SINGER's feature-rich 4K Android Google TV will enhance your home enjoyment.
